lines: Can't say I much care for the ridiculous uniforms those blokes over there at the Hall of Flames have to wear.
If you fancy sporting the same blue duds, though, you could always enlist. The Immortal Flames take everyone─even foreigners.
We've received some peculiar orders of late: we're to report any sightings of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
I...I don't understand. Aren't they the ones who oppose the Empire and fight the primals? Aren't they on our side?
Blessedly, our orders to keep watch for the Scions of the Seventh Dawn were rescinded not long after the Flame General was formally reinstated.
Hopefully this will go some way towards defusing the recent tensions between the Brass Blades and the Immortal Flames.

obj.n: イシュガルド戦勝祝賀会
エンシェントバックラー
ヴァーミリオンホーバージョン
ヴァーミリオンスカート
ヴァーミリオンソルレット
